https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tfYnt1caU4YhpHMyMvdxq6xW4jw.jpg Set in New York's gay "bear" scene and taking a cue from the popular HBO franchise "Sex and the City," BearCity follows a tight-knit pack of friends experiencing comical mishaps, emotionally sweet yet lusty romantic encounters and a cast of colorful, diverse characters as they gear up for a big party weekend BearCity
